acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This colletion was purchased from David J. Holmes, Philadelphia, Pa, on December 12, 1995.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This letter is from E. E. Cummings, 4 Patchin Place, New York, New York, to Gilbert Seldes, concerning a Dartmouth document and sending best wishes from Marion.
